item.title: Fitting and Interpretting Models
item.description: Import Dataset : Paris Paintings Goal: Predict height from width \[\widehat{height}_{i} = \beta_0 + \beta_1 \times width_{i}\] ## `geom_smooth()` using formula 'y ~ x' Step 1: Specify model linear_reg() ## Linear Regression Model Specification (regression) Step 2: Set model fitting engine linear_reg() %>% set_engine("lm") # lm: linear model ## Linear Regression Model Specification (regression) ## ## Computational engine: lm Step 3: Fit model & estimate parameters â€¦ using formula syntax
